pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R Interface to the 'ROPTLIB' Library for Riemannian Manifold Optimization // An R interface to version 0.3 of the 'ROPTLIB' optimization library (see http://www.math.fsu.edu/~whuang2 for more information). Optimize real- valued functions over manifolds such as Stiefel, Grassmann, and Symmetric Positive Definite matrices. For details see Martin et. al. (2020) doi:10.18637/jss.v093.i01.
